EmailTemplate.name: 17.NokCorp.Partner.All.T.G.E.11158.GPP 17.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Your partner in broadband evolution… The Nokia Global Partner Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Nokia Global Partner Program Evolution is a natural phenomenon of life. At Nokia, we are committed to continually evolving our partner program with our expert knowledge, special tools and marketing support so partners have everything needed to successfully position and sell Nokia products and services.
Watch our short video featuring the Nokia Global Partner Program to see how we can partner together to turn our ideas into the future global nervous system to transform the human experience.
Watch video <[[https://tools.ext.nokia.com/asset/201216]]>
To learn more about the Nokia Global Partner Program, please visit our Partner Portal <[[https://my-home.alcatel-lucent.com/portal/web/partnerportal/]]>. Connect with us © 2017 Nokia. Contact us <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/contact]]> | Privacy policy <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/privacy]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
